author: ThioJoe
description:
They couldn't just make it better 😒

YouTube just added a new feature to the search page that should be useful to EVERYONE. You can now separately filter to search for only long form videos, or shorts. Before, selecting"videos" would combine those two together. However, YouTube also made some other changes to the other available search filters, including removing some sort options.

Time Stamps:
0:00 - Intro
1:23 - The Bad News
1:45 - Changed Sorting Options
2:50 - Removed Sorting Options
4:16 - Removed Filter By Last Hour
title: YouTube Just Got Better (But Also Worse)
